ygData.subject: The Big Chair
ygData.msgSnippet: ... He makes it too the Bridge. I hoped for this chance for a long time. I just hate that its because KitKat is gone. He sits in the command chair.

::DrillBit::

He makes it too the Bridge.
"I hoped for this chance for a long time. I just hate that its because
KitKat is gone."
He sits in the command chair.
